title: Dai Li
synopsis: It tells about a cute castle in the dream forest, a tree house school in the cute castle, and a witch who lives here. She hates children and uses witchcraft to persecute them. The child hit by witchcraft can no longer laugh and loses joy. The only thing that can decipher her witchcraft is to make her laugh, which means that if someone can make a witch laugh, the witchcraft will disappear automatically. In the Meng Castle, there lived the raccoon family, and his classmates in the tree house school-Mei Mei Zhu, Long Rabbit, Yuan Yuan Xiong and many other children, as well as the principal Wisdom Turtle. In order to get rid of the witch's prohibition on others from entering the dream forest and let the happy laughter fill the sky above the forest, they fought the witch again and again and won victory (translated from iqiyi)
